== Udma (CT) (627166) ==

Udma (CT) is a town in the [[Hosdurg]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 4.53 sq. km. and harbouring 1669 households with total population of 8115 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 18 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 573 km. Male population is 3593 and female population is 4522. Scheduled Caste population is 35 and Scheduled Tribes population is 8. Census Location Code of the town is 627166<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 18 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 152 km. Railway station is at Kottikulam at a distance of 2 km.
